Migration.Name: Bug fixed the Outbound Order functionality

PO.Data: iob.DocStatus IN ('CO','CL') AND iob.IsSOTrx='Y' AND (COALESCE(iobl.MovementQty,0) - COALESCE(iobl.PickedQty,0)) <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DD_OrderLine ol INNER JOIN DD_Order o ON (ol.DD_Order_ID = o.DD_Order_ID) WHERE o.DocStatus NOT IN ('CL','VO') AND ol.WM_InOutBoundLine_ID=iobl.WM_InOutBoundLine_ID AND COALESCE(ol.QtyOrdered, 0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered,0) <> 0)

Data.oldValue: iob.DocStatus IN ('CO','CL') AND iob.IsSOTrx='Y' AND (COALESCE(iobl.MovementQty,0) - COALESCE(iobl.PickedQty,0)) <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DD_OrderLine ol INNER JOIN DD_Order o ON (ol.DD_Order_ID = o.DD_Order_ID) WHERE o.DocStatus NOT IN ('CL','VO') AND ol.WM_InOutBoundLine_ID=iobl.WM_InOutBoundLine_ID AND COALESCE(ol.QtyOrdered, 0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered,0) <> 0)

PO.Data: iob.IsSOTrx='Y' AND (COALESCE(iobl.MovementQty,0) - COALESCE(iobl.PickedQty,0)) <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DD_OrderLine ol INNER JOIN DD_Order o ON (ol.DD_Order_ID = o.DD_Order_ID) WHERE o.DocStatus NOT IN ('CL','VO') AND ol.WM_InOutBoundLine_ID=iobl.WM_InOutBoundLine_ID AND COALESCE(ol.QtyOrdered, 0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered,0) <> 0)

Data.oldValue: IsSOTrx='Y' AND DocStatus='CO' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WM_InOutBoundLine WHERE WM_InOutBoundLine.C_OrderLine_ID = ol.C_OrderLine_ID)

PO.Data: o.IsSOTrx = 'Y' AND o.DocStatus = 'CO' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WM_InOutBoundLine iobl INNER JOIN WM_InOutBound iob ON (iobl.WM_InOutBound_ID = iob.WM_InOutBound_ID) WHERE iob.DocStatus NOT IN ('CL', 'VO') AND iobl.C_OrderLine_ID = ol.C_OrderLine_ID AND COALESCE(QtyOrdered, 0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered, 0) <> 0 )

Data.oldValue: demand.OrderType IN ('SOO','DOO' , 'MOP') AND demand.DocStatus IN ('CO','IP') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WM_InOutBoundLine WHERE WM_InOutBoundLine.PP_MRP_ID = demand.PP_MRP_ID)

PO.Data: demand.OrderType IN ('SOO', 'DOO', 'MOP') AND demand.DocStatus IN ('CO', 'IP') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WM_InOutBoundLine WHERE WM_InOutBoundLine.PP_MRP_ID = demand.PP_MRP_ID AND COALESCE(demand.qty, 0) <> 0 )

Data.oldValue: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_InOutLine WHERE M_InOutLine.C_OrderLine_ID = iobl.C_OrderLine_ID AND iobl.PickedQty >= M_InOutLine.MovementQty) AND iob.IsSOTrx='Y' AND iobl.Processed='Y' AND ol.QtyOrdered <> ol.QtyDelivered

PO.Data: AND iob.DocStatus IN ('CO') AND (COALESCE(iobl.PickedQty,0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered)) <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_InOutLine WHERE M_InOutLine.C_OrderLine_ID = iobl.C_OrderLine_ID AND iobl.PickedQty >= M_InOutLine.MovementQty) AND iob.IsSOTrx='Y' AND iobl.Processed='Y' AND ol.QtyOrdered <> ol.QtyDelivered

Data.oldValue: AND iob.DocStatus IN ('CO') AND (COALESCE(iobl.PickedQty,0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered)) <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_InOutLine WHERE M_InOutLine.C_OrderLine_ID = iobl.C_OrderLine_ID AND iobl.PickedQty >= M_InOutLine.MovementQty) AND iob.IsSOTrx='Y' AND iobl.Processed='Y' AND ol.QtyOrdered <> ol.QtyDelivered

iob.DocStatus IN ('CO') AND (COALESCE(iobl.PickedQty,0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered)) <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_InOutLine WHERE M_InOutLine.C_OrderLine_ID = iobl.C_OrderLine_ID AND iobl.PickedQty >= M_InOutLine.MovementQty) AND iob.IsSOTrx='Y' AND iobl.Processed='Y' AND ol.QtyOrdered <> ol.QtyDelivered

Data.oldValue: iob.DocStatus IN ('CO') AND (COALESCE(iobl.PickedQty,0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered)) <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_InOutLine WHERE M_InOutLine.C_OrderLine_ID = iobl.C_OrderLine_ID AND iobl.PickedQty >= M_InOutLine.MovementQty) AND iob.IsSOTrx='Y' AND iobl.Processed='Y' AND ol.QtyOrdered <> ol.QtyDelivered

PO.Data: iobl.DocStatus IN ('CO') AND ( COALESCE(iobl.PickedQty, 0) - COALESCE(iobl.QtyDelivered) ) <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM M_InOutLine WHERE M_InOutLine.C_OrderLine_ID = iobl.C_OrderLine_ID AND iobl.PickedQty >= M_InOutLine.MovementQty ) AND iobl.IsSOTrx = 'Y' AND iobl.Processed = 'Y' AND iobl.QtyOrdered <> iobl.QtyDelivered

Data.oldValue: o.IsSOTrx = 'Y' AND o.DocStatus = 'CO' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WM_InOutBoundLine iobl INNER JOIN WM_InOutBound iob ON (iobl.WM_InOutBound_ID = iob.WM_InOutBound_ID) WHERE iob.DocStatus NOT IN ('CL', 'VO') AND iobl.C_OrderLine_ID = ol.C_OrderLine_ID AND COALESCE(QtyOrdered, 0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered, 0) <> 0 )

PO.Data: o.IsSOTrx = 'Y' AND o.DocStatus = 'CO' AND COALESCE(ol.QtyOrdered, 0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered, 0) <> 0 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WM_InOutBoundLine iobl INNER JOIN WM_InOutBound iob ON (iobl.WM_InOutBound_ID = iob.WM_InOutBound_ID) WHERE iob.DocStatus NOT IN ('CL', 'VO') AND iobl.C_OrderLine_ID = ol.C_OrderLine_ID AND COALESCE(ol.QtyOrdered, 0) - COALESCE(ol.QtyDelivered, 0) <> 0 )
